content: mouse cat-toy amigurumi crochet pattern by baldmoose copyright © baldmoose 2019 notes on this pattern approximate finished size body 7cm long tail 7cm long skill level easy/medium supplies 8ply yarn the equivalent of light worsted yarn in any colours you choose 3 5mm crochet hook 3mm crochet hook scissors stuffing embroidery cotton optional instead of eyes 4mm black safety back eyes or size/colour of your choice or you can embroider eyes on or stitch on buttons stitch marker or equivalent abbreviations this pattern is written with uk crochet terminology us terminology is included in brackets in this section but will not be used throughout the pattern chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet st s stitch/es repeat - repeat decrease decrease a decreasing stitch is a way of lessening the number of stitches in a round by cinching two stitches together to make one it is used when decreasing the width of a round in- sert hook through both loops of first st wrap yarn over hook and draw back through insert hook through both loops of next st wrap yarn over hook and draw through - this leaves three loops on the hook wrap yarn over the hook again and draw it through the remaining loops on the hook leaving just one loop on the hook note work this pattern in continuous rounds i find it helpful to use something to mark the beginning of each round to make it easier to keep count move the marker up to the first stitch of the next round after finishing the previous one copyright © baldmoose 2019 pattern beginning at the nose and working down to the tail using the 3 5mm crochet hook 1 2 chain 4 double_crochet in first chain 4 2 2 double_crochet in first double_crochet of previous round 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in next st 6 3 1 double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st repeat x 3 9 4 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next st repeat x 3 12 5 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet of previous round 12 6 1 double_crochet in next 2 sts 2 double_crochet in next st repeat x 4 16 7 1 double_crochet in next 3 sts 2 double_crochet in next st repeat x 4 20 do not fasten_off yarn this is a good place to stop and insert the eyes fasten the safety eyes between the stitches of the 4th and 5th row 5 stitches apart if you are us- ing buttons stitch them on now if you are choosing to embroider the eyes on do so now you could stitch them or create the eyes by tying a french knot 8-13 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet of previous round 20 14 1dc in 3 next sts decrease repeat x 4 16 stuff your mouse now before decreasing any more insert bell or catnip if you wish to use them
